duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the overall labor efforts for self-perform MECHANICAL/PLUMBING contractor projects in Heavy Industrial and Institutional Construction.
Ensure management controls are fully capable during project execution, including schedules, cost control, procurement, and quality/safety.
Demonstrate problem solving skills and be completely familiar with mechanical and plumbing system installation and operation.
Oversee industrial and institutional mechanical construction projects, ensuring successful completion.
Identify growth opportunities and refine marketing strategies by analyzing market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity.
